76.heading: ALTERNATIVE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
76.title: I Saw You : Comics Inspired by Real Life Missed Connections
76.author: compiled by Julia Wertz.
notes: "This anthology of comics inspired by real-life missed connection ads posted on Craigslist and in local papers around the country will tug at your heartstrings and make you think. Lonely hearts, romantics, and even cynics pore over missed connection ads in search of love, to gawk and giggle, or out of curiosity. These posted stranger sightings and chance encounters lay bare the truths and oddities of real-life loneliness and attractions and bring out the voyeur in the best of us".
